languages.text: "Ты нарушаешь правила. Ты сам{mf||а} заявил{mf||а} их, с самого начала... а затем начал{mf||а} сбиваться и путать слова. Ты либо обладаешь, либо позволяешь обладать тобой. Никаких полуоттенков".

"You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."
languages.original_text: "Ты нарушаешь правила. Ты сам{mf||а} заявил{mf||а} их, с самого начала... а затем начал{mf||а} сбиваться и путать слова. Ты либо обладаешь, либо позволяешь обладать тобой. Никаких полуоттенков".

traits.locale_text: "You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."

"You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."

"You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."

"You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."

languages.text: “你破坏了规则。这些规则是你一开始亲手定下来的……但你接下来却偏离了你的角色，混淆是非。在这场游戏里，要么占有对方，要么被对方占有，没有中间地带。”
languages.original_text: "You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."

traits.locale_text: “你破坏了规则。这些规则是你一开始亲手定下来的……但你接下来却偏离了你的角色，混淆是非。在这场游戏里，要么占有对方，要么被对方占有，没有中间地带。”

languages.text: 「お前はルールを破った。お前がはじめに決めたというのに…自分の役割から脱線して、言葉を混ぜ始めた。お前にある選択肢は、首輪をつけるか、つけられるかのどちらかだ。その中間などない」
languages.original_text: "You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はルールを破った。お前がはじめに決めたというのに…自分の役割から脱線して、言葉を混ぜ始めた。お前にある選択肢は、首輪をつけるか、つけられるかのどちらかだ。その中間などない」

languages.text: «Infringes las reglas. Las que tú {mf|mismo|misma} estableciste al principio del juego... y después empezaste a salirte del papel, a mezclar las palabras. Debes poseer o ser la posesión; no existe término medio».
languages.original_text: "You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."

traits.locale_text: «Infringes las reglas. Las que tú {mf|mismo|misma} estableciste al principio del juego... y después empezaste a salirte del papel, a mezclar las palabras. Debes poseer o ser la posesión; no existe término medio».

languages.text: « Vous enfreignez les règles. Vous les avez définies vous-même au tout début... et vous n'avez cessé de sortir de votre rôle en jouant sur les mots. En ce bas monde, soit on possède, soit on se laisse posséder. Il n'y a pas de moyen terme. »
languages.original_text: "You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."

traits.locale_text: « Vous enfreignez les règles. Vous les avez définies vous-même au tout début... et vous n'avez cessé de sortir de votre rôle en jouant sur les mots. En ce bas monde, soit on possède, soit on se laisse posséder. Il n'y a pas de moyen terme. »

languages.text: "Ihr brecht die Regeln. Ihr selbst habt sie festgelegt, am Anfang unserer Unterhaltung ... und dann habt Ihr entschieden, sie nicht zu befolgen und alles durcheinander zu bringen. Entweder Ihr leitet oder Ihr lasst Euch leiten. Dazwischen gibt es nichts."
languages.original_text: "You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr brecht die Regeln. Ihr selbst habt sie festgelegt, am Anfang unserer Unterhaltung ... und dann habt Ihr entschieden, sie nicht zu befolgen und alles durcheinander zu bringen. Entweder Ihr leitet oder Ihr lasst Euch leiten. Dazwischen gibt es nichts."

languages.text: "Kuralları çiğniyorsun. En baştan onları kendin belirliyorsun... Sonra da rolünden uzaklaşmaya başlayıp laf karıştırıyorsun. Ya sahip oluyorsun ya da sahip olunmaya razı geliyorsun. Ortası yok."
languages.original_text: "You break the rules. You set them yourself, at the very beginning... and then you started straying outside your role, mixing up words. You either possess or allow yourself to be possessed. There is no in-between."

traits.locale_text: "Kuralları çiğniyorsun. En baştan onları kendin belirliyorsun... Sonra da rolünden uzaklaşmaya başlayıp laf karıştırıyorsun. Ya sahip oluyorsun ya da sahip olunmaya razı geliyorsun. Ortası yok."
